ygData.subject: SV: [archive-crawler] It's possible to pack an unpack WARC-File?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi Virginie. You probably want to make a WARC-metadata-record for the METS file. The WARCWriter class has writeMetadataRecord() that can be used for this

Hi Virginie.
You probably want to make a WARC-metadata-record for the METS =
file.

The WARCWriter class has writeMetadataRecord() that can be used for =
this purpose.

/S=F8ren 

-----Oprindelig meddelelse-----

I unpack the whole WARC-Container to add in every file inside a METS.x=
ml file. 
So now, I would like to pack it's again in a new WARC-Container l=
ike that:
WARC + Mets.xml(every file) -> to the new WARC-Container
Please a=
ny Idea?
